short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A collection of power tools to help Matterport Service Providers succeed including Mattertag Transfer and Bulk Editing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MP[tools] will allow you to force loading one set of Mattertags onto another Matterport space.  This will allow you to open a new space with Matterport 'Edit Mode' or Workshop, populate tags from an older version of a tour and then save the tags - saving you hours of time in manually recreating them.
